diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $AD$ is $3sqrt{2}$ units.
The length of the line $CD$ is $z$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $sqrt{2}$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $y$ units.
The length of the line $AB$ is $x$ units.
Point $D$ lies on the line connecting $A$ and $C$.
The line connecting $C$ and $D$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $B$ and $D$.
The line connecting $B$ and $C$ is perpendicular to the line connecting $A$ and $B$.
